m_szDocSumamry: Login Sign up Search Expert Search Quick Search Patents/Apps Non-Patent Literature SEARCH RESEARCH MPEP 2.0 TOOLS & RESOURCES ACCLAIM IP HELP Title: In-vehicle battery monitor United States Patent 8674654 Abstract: An apparatus and a method of monitoring a battery in an automotive vehicle are provided. An output is provided which can be a relative output as a function of minimum and maximum parameters of the battery. Inventors: Bertness, Kevin I. (Batavia, IL, US) Application Number: 13/205904 Publication Date: 03/18/2014 Filing Date: 08/09/2011 Export Citation: Click for automatic bibliograph
